++ Scanning

Scanning is looking through information on demand to locate something. This is the opposite of [Indexing].
    * SmartResources

++Improvements
Scanning is effectively [Polling] and for [Performance] reasons, only happen once. OnlyPollOnce. This is why it is coupled with [Indexing] where the scan forces a ContinuousInitialization to the index. This lightens the weaknesses of each strategy.
    see [Search]

++Advantages
    * Requires no permanent storage space.
    * On-demand, no previous organisation
    * Format specific scanning routines can be used on each item.

++Disadvantages
    * [Processing] intensive.
    * Slow
